marklogic.body:
see the PROBLEM is that Diggy need to move away from them female fans that got him looking like a teen pop type of singer.
the same lil female fans bow wow and lil romeo had.
its a good and a Bad to have them type fans.
the good part is they will go hard to support u.
BUT the bad part is they going threw a faze thats not going to last long and when that faze is over, they not going to support u like they once did.
They more into how CUTE he look then his music. Diggy got to Reach all AGE GROUPS.
EVERY ARTIST cant Have the JUSTIN BIEBER fans
JUSTIN BIEBER gona be in the same Spot just like bow wow in the future
